data.stext: Developed by certified Swiss tax experts.
We take data security as our highest priority.
Ensures that no hacking of data is possible.
With Taxly profit & impact are in balance.

SingalData.actiOneP1Text: Taxly is an online service which allows you to quickly and easily create an optimised tax return.
SingalData.sslOneH31Heading: How long is the preparation of the tax return?
SingalData.actiOneP2Text: Taxly’s AI will guide you through some simplified tax return questions based on your personal situation, the process should take around 10 minutes.
SingalData.actiOneP3Text: For more complex cases, it can take between 15 and 20 minutes.
SingalData.sslOneH32Heading: How is taxly different from that of a traditional cantonal tax software?
SingalData.actiOneP4Text: Cantonal softwares such as EasyTax, PrivateTax, BalTax or GeTax were developed primarily to speed up the internal process of the authorities and to help their users fill in their tax.
SingalData.actiOneP5Text: Taxly is the first tax return technology in Switzerland which has ease of use and customer satisfaction as its primary goal. Our team constantly reviews our product to make sure that our flows are simplified and easy to understand, while making sure that tax law is followed.
SingalData.actiOneP6Text: Furthermore, any court decisions or changes in cantonal laws are immediately implemented in taxly, which in some cases takes years to be implemented in traditional cantonal software.
SingalData.actiOneP7Text: Finally, this software was prepared to take advantage of all available deductions in the cantonal law and practise, which is not systematically the case when you prepare your tax return with a cantonal software, often resulting in 100s of Francs in taxes being wasted.
SingalData.sslOneH33Heading: When can I expect taxly to be available in my country?
SingalData.actiOneP8Text: Taxly has huge global ambitions, and we are preparing for additional country launches in 2022, in addition our B2B platform and global insights.
SingalData.sslOneH34Heading: How can I reach you guys?
SingalData.actiOneP9Text: You can get in touch with our team by simply clicking the ‘Help’ button on the lower right corner of this page. You can also log into your taxly dashboard and click on the chat icon. If you are considering taxly, we’d love to hear from you.
SingalData.sslOneH35Heading: What does being a B-Corp mean?
SingalData.actiOneP10Text: Certified B Corporations are a new kind of business that balance purpose and profit. They are legally required to consider the impact of their decisions on their workers, customers, suppliers, community, and the environment.
SingalData.actiOneP11Text: We believe these are important values and have therefore deliberately chosen to be a B-Corp.
SingalData.actiOneP12Text: Taxly AG is located in Zurich, one of the financial capitals of the world. We are registered at the Zurich commercial registry, registrations number CHE-253.409.943, Stockerstrasse 38, 8002 Zurich, Switzerland.
SingalData.actiOneP13Text: Taxly has been built by a mix of Certified Swiss Tax Experts and seasoned technology entrepreneurs.
SingalData.actiTwoP1Text: The full taxly experience is available through our website and on mobile browsers. Soon we will also offer a native mobile app with additional benefits. Taxly has completely rethought the Swiss Tax process from a customer’s point of view in order to make it simple, easy to understand, and fully optimized.
SingalData.actiTwoP2Text: Simply answer some questions and our AI will fully optimize your personal tax situation.
SingalData.actiTwoP3Text: If your tax situation is more complex we will pair you with one of our inhouse Swiss Certified Tax Experts who will personally go through your tax return.
SingalData.actiTwoP4Text: This depends on your individual circumstance. We try and offer our services at very attractive rates.
SingalData.sslTwoH32Heading: What if in the end I see a mistake in my tax return?
SingalData.actiTwoP5Text: That’s no problem, simply log into your dashboard and click on the EDIT link on your completed tax return, make the adjustment and we can re-issue you a new version.
SingalData.headingTitleThree: Which tax years are covered by taxly?
SingalData.actiThreeP1Text: Taxly offers to file for the 2019 tax year and onwards.
SingalData.sslThreeH31Heading: Which tax cases are not covered by taxly?
SingalData.actiThreeP2Text: Taxly trys to support all possible cantons and situations by pairing you with one of our inhouse Swiss Certified Tax Experts when there is more complexity.
SingalData.sslThreeH32Heading: Which cantons are covered by taxly?
SingalData.actiThreeP3Text: Taxly offers its straight through services for residents of the following cantons: Zurich, Aargau, Basel-Land, St. Gallen, Bern, Basel-Stadt, Luzerne. For all the other cantons we match you with our inhouse Swiss Certified Tax Experts who will do the tax return for you on a more personal basis.
SingalData.headingTitleFour: When do I receive my salary certificate?
SingalData.actiFourP1Text: Your employer has to prepare it for you and you should have received it no later than mid- to end of February of the following year.
SingalData.sslFourH31Heading: Where do I find my bank statements?
SingalData.actiFourP2Text: Most banks are now not sending their tax statements per post but rather have it online on the electronic banking platform. You should look for statements for all your bank and financial accounts as of 31.12 of the previous year.
SingalData.sslFourH32Heading: Where do I find insurance policy statements?
SingalData.actiFourP3Text: Insurance companies offering life insurance policies and indeed any kind of insurance policy are mandated to send an overview for tax purposes every year. These are usually sent by post to your home address at the beginning of the year. If you have not received anything, we advise you to contact your insurance company.
SingalData.sslFourH33Heading: What kind of receipts can I use for deductions?
SingalData.actiFourP4Text: In general, for most deductions, proof of payment is sufficient. We suggest therefore attaching a proof of payment from your bank along with the corresponding invoice.
SingalData.sslFourH34Heading: How much tax will I have to pay?
SingalData.actiFourP5Text: Taxly does not currently support in the first version the computation of the amount of taxes and therefore cannot inform on your tax liability. We plan on including this function for the 2020 tax year.
SingalData.sslFourH35Heading: I already have an accountant doing my taxes, how can I switch to taxly?
SingalData.actiFourP6Text: Quite simply! You have to contact your accountant and tell him/her you are doing your taxes from now on with your own solution. They will then have to inform the authorities that all information be rerouted directly to you and they will send you all the information we require for you to fill your taxes, including the tax form.
SingalData.actiFourP7Text: or further information related to Swiss tax, you can visit our tax dictionary page.
SingalData.actiFiveP1Text: Very much so! We highly value and respect your privacy (see our Privacy Policy). We will not share or sell your information to any third parties for any purpose.
SingalData.sslFiveH31Heading: Who has access to my data?
SingalData.actiFiveP2Text: Data security is our top priority. Only you can view your data. All data and uploaded receipts are stored and encrypted at all times. Your data will only be processed via an encrypted Internet connection. Detailed information on data protection and our measures to ensure data security can be found in our data protection regulations.
SingalData.sslFiveH32Heading: Can I delete my account and data?
SingalData.actiFiveP3Text: Yes, you can completely delete your tax data from your user account at any time. Please note that in this case it is no longer possible to restore your data.
SingalData.actiFiveP4Text: Read more about Data Protection and Privacy here.
SingalData.actiSixP1Text: We strongly believe that Climate Change is the most pressing issue of our time. In its current form, industry grows at the expense of the planet. For us and our community, there is a real desire to be able to engage in actions for the environment, even as a start up and for profit-business.
SingalData.actiSixP2Text: We are a young company. Alone, we might not make a large impact. But could it be as simple as just asking other startups to join us? We think it might. There are many startups already doing incredible things to give back. Bigger and better than we might hope to right now.
SingalData.actiSixP3Text: This is not about positioning ourselves above, or shaming those who don’t participate, but is intended to be a positive and encouraging call to action for those who agree that we could be doing better.
SingalData.actiSixP4Text: We will be supporting a charity focused on climate change / environmental impact. For every donation made by our customers, we will match it.
SingalData.actiSixP5Text: We will be campaigning on social, onsite and in the press. Spreading the word about our customers and those start-ups who join the movement.
SingalData.actiSixP6Text: We hope that this may be the first of many collaborations between customers and corporations to come and make a change for the better.

data.title: How does taxly work?
data.description: Complete your Swiss tax return without any tax knowledge in 10 minutes

data.title: Simplified Questions
data.description: AI Roger will guide you through simplified questions that are only relevant to your situation.

data.title: Let Roger do his thing!
data.description: Roger will compute and optimise your tax return better than any human, by checking the relevant rules and finding deductions in a split second.

data.title: Review & confirm
data.description: In a matter of minutes you can review a fully completed tax return. And don’t worry Roger is best friends with your local tax authority to ensure the output is checked and correct.

data.title: Submit with a click
data.description: We handle the submission to your local tax office, either electronically or via post so you don’t have to worry about it. We’ll keep you informed, of course, and you can always retrieve your data online.

Gain insights on how to optimize your finances
Help us fight climate change

SingleData.OneHeadingH2: What is Taxly, and what is the purpose of this Privacy Policy and the Terms of Service?
SingleData.OneHeadingH2POne: With Taxly you can quickly and easily fill out your tax return and have it prepared for filing. We can also submit your tax return directly for you in the cantons that allow electronic filing. In order to be able to offer you these services we need to establish regulations regarding certain points. You can find these general regulations Terms of Service. You can find information on how we handle your data in this Privacy Policy.
SingleData.OneHeadingH2PTwo: By “we” or “us” we mean Taxly AG, which offers these services. By “you” we mean you as a user of our website, services. “Taxly” means the services that we offer you after logging in within the areas of our services that require registration. By “website” we mean the areas of our website and app that can be accessed before login or used without registration. Terms relating to data protection law have the meaning according to the Swiss Data Protection Act (“DSG”, version of 01/03/2019,

data: By using our website, app and our services in general, you expressly agree to this Privacy Policy and the associated Terms of Service

By registering, you consent to us processing your data in accordance with the provisions of this Privacy Policy for the provision of our services and to our using this data for certain other purposes, as described below in this Privacy Policy.

By registering with us you confirm that you give us your correct age and actual place of residence and that you have all the necessary authorisations to provide us with the data and documents that you provide to us (e.g. by entering data or uploading documents).

PrivacyPolicy1.sectionHeading: 1. Privacy Policy for the Use of the Website
data: If you only use the website (without login), you agree to the Terms of Service for the Website in accordance with this no. Error! Reference source not found. (the “website privacy regulations”) and with the associated Terms of Service for the Use of the Website (no. 1 Terms of Service). Changes to these website privacy regulations by Taxly AG are possible at any time and will be published here. The current website privacy regulations at the time of your use apply.

When accessing our website, we automatically collect access data transmitted from your browser (such as the IP address of the respective device, date and time (so-called “timestamp”), requested and possibly the requesting URL (so-called “referrer URL”), information on the browser and operating system used and comparable other technical data). The collection and processing of this data is necessary to enable you to access our website and to enable certain security measures to be taken to secure our systems (such as the defence against dDoS attacks). This data is only stored in an unchanged form for as long as is technically necessary. Then it is deleted or anonymised by shortening the IP addresses.

For the administration of our website as well as for the analysis of user behaviour, we use cookies and analysis technologies listed in no. 2.3. You can use both the website and Taxly without cookies by deactivating them in your browser and deleting any cookies that have already been set. You can find out how to do this in the help function of your browser and under no. 4 (Cookie/analysis tool info). Some of the analysis services we use also provide deactivation/opt-out functions. You can find further information on this in the privacy policy for the respective analysis services (no. 4).
Please note that when you deactivate/delete cookies or deactivate certain features of the analysis services we use, certain features of the website/Taxly may no longer function properly.

SingleData.pageSubHeading: We’re happy to answer any questions or feedback you may have!
Taxly is on a mission to reinvent the tax experience at scale by enabling our customers to be financially optimised in order to create a much better standard of living
SingleData.AboutUsOMSubHeading: Our vision is to focus relentlessly on the customer experience, by supporting our customers for each major financial decision, in order for them to feel safe, be financially optimised and create a much better standard of living.
